config.script: console.log('🔍 检查mock聊天结果...'); const pageTitle = document.title; const pageUrl = window.location.href; const isChatPage = pageUrl.includes('air.1688.com'); const hasHighlightedElement = document.querySelector('[style*="background-color"][style*="lightgreen"], [style*="border"][style*="green"], [style*="background-color"][style*="yellow"]') || document.querySelector('.chat-highlight, .mock-highlight'); console.log('页面标题:', pageTitle); console.log('当前URL:', pageUrl); console.log('是否为聊天页面:', isChatPage); console.log('是否有高亮元素:', !!hasHighlightedElement); const inputElements = document.querySelectorAll('div[contenteditable="true"], textarea, input[type="text"]'); const sendButtons = document.querySelectorAll('button[class*="send"], [title*="发送"], .send-btn'); return { success: isChatPage && hasHighlightedElement, pageTitle, pageUrl, isChatPage, hasHighlightedElement: !!hasHighlightedElement, inputCount: inputElements.length, sendButtonCount: sendButtons.length, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };
